title: ELECTRIC BIKE CONVERSIONS | E-BIKE KITS | ELECTRIC BICYCLES | CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE TO ELECTRIC
text:
Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your riding performance.
Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.
E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :
1. Type of terrain.
2. Torque.
3. Speed.
4. Range.
5. Frame size.
6. Weight.
7. Riding preferences .
Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:

Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)
Your height ( right frame size )
Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)


WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:
1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :

You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.
Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?
Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.


2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATION

Your bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .
In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .


3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITY

Choices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.
Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.
A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.


4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICE

S.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.
We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.
Your e-bike is compatible with most batteries and bicyle components in the market and therefore when it comes to the time when you need to replace anything you have a wider choice.
100% Satisfaction & Money Back Guarantee

And has spent most of it's life under cover in my garage, taken well care of, both wheels are flat from sitting but are basically like new with no cracks at all. And no punctures as well, put some air in the wheels and it will be ready to ride on the spot!Features:*Giant Axact 9w wireless computer.*Shimano disc brakes front and rear.*Shimano front and rear Derailer.*Maxxis Ardent tires front and rear.*Adjustable magnesium and aluminum front airshocks.*Underseat pouch with tubeless repair kit and tools.Giant Axact 9w wireless computer features: *One buttons operation.*Auto Power on/off.*Maximum Speed.*Trip distance.*Odometer.*12/24hour clock.*Riding time.*Calories burnt.*Completely wireless.The Giant Talon 1 27.5 inch is a great bike overall, on road or off road it is completely capable and incredibly reliable, with maxxis tires and app of the bikes on-board hardware from Shimano, this bike will take you anywhere and everywhere!These bikes are close to 20K brand new, and this one is in it's prime still being basically new and in immaculate condition, looking for 11K but I am open for negotiation/nearest offers.Contact me here or at: 073 778 8361.

title: Merida Big Nine XT Edi
text: Our aluminium BIG.NINE XT-EDITION hardtail that just drips with Shimano’s XT components. But the XT is more than just a high-quality drivetrain and powerful brakes. To finish the picture and make our XT-EDITION one of the most desirable bikes in our aluminium hardtail line-up, we spec our double butted aluminium frame with a Manitou Markhor fork and tubeless ready wheelset.Mountain biking is one of the most varied cycling disciplines and probably the most demanding when it comes to equipment. While full suspension bikes offer amazing riding characteristics, the classic hardtail remains one of the purest tools for the job. Our 29er wheel equipped BIG.NINE range comes in carbon and aluminium and features multiple geometry options. The carbon and LITE framed BIG.NINE, with its racing geometry, is an ideal companion on XC and marathon race tracks whilst the more relaxed geometry of the BIG.NINE TFS and SPEED offers a more comfortable, upright riding position. Our classic hardtails are the backbone of our range and showcase the enormous wealth of experience and knowledge we could gain in almost half a century of bike production and manufacturing. The BIG.NINE range symbolises the symbiosis between modern frame technology, attention to detail and craftsmanship ‘Made in Taiwan’.Double butted smooth welded aluminium frame with 29er wheelsLess aggressive and more upright geometry for maximum control and comfortManitou Markhor 100 mm travel suspension fork with remote lockoutShimano XT 12-speed drivetrain and Shimano XT disc brakesTubeless ready wheelset and fast Maxxis tyresInternal cable routingDescription Frame Big.nine Tfs IiiFrame Size: XLColor Dark Silver (Black)Fork Manitou Markhor CompBrakes Shimano XT Rotors Shimano Rt54Headset Merida M2331Handlebar Merida Expert CcHandlebar Stem Merida Expert CcGrip Merida Comp EcDerailleur (R) Shimano Xt M8100 Shadow+Shifters Shimano XTSeat Post Merida Comp CcSeat Clamp Merida Comp QrSaddle Merida Comp SlPedal Vp Vpe-891Chain Kmc X12Crank Shimano XtFreewheel Shimano Deore M6100Bottom Bracket Shimano Bb52 BsaHubs Shimano Mt400-b / Shimano Mt401Rim Merida Expert CcTyre Front Maxxis IkonTyre Rear Maxxis IkonSpokes Double Butted Black StainlessMax Weight 135 Kg

title: Giant - Ad posted by goldenhomes_wa
text: Giant BicycleA vintage Giant High Sierra ATB mountain bike, tuned and ready for mashing around town, exploring single track, or cruising around with the family. Quite possibly the first mountain bike Giant ever made, it looks suspiciously similar to the Schwinn High Sierra made in the mid 1980's. A 4130 cro-moly frame, Suntour forged dropouts with axle adjusters, Suntour retro friction thumb shifters, Suntour Mountech derailleurs, Dia Compe 980 cantilever brakes, Sugino GT 48/40/30 cranks, bull moose bars, and Sunshine high flange bolt on hubs with Araya aluminum 26" rims. Professionally dialed in and set up for duty once more. Seat tube is 21" so it will fit riders from 5'9" to 6'0". A great bike for all occasions, and this one is not very common.Model : Sierra Sport Series Size Frame: LargeGears: Shimano 21 Speed Grip changeBike StandGear Guard Mudguards Bull Horn Extension handlesAll Reasonable Offers ConsideredWhatsapp +27838931060

title: Cannondale Flash 700cc gravel setup
text:
Frame Size

L

Model Year

2013

Wheel Size

29"

Frame Material

Carbon

Hi guys, i have a Gravel grinder build i wanted to build a little while ago, i have the Gravel Headshock Cannondale fork trhat integrates perfectly with the cannondale SI headshock.

please not the front shock can run 700cc wheels, QR , i put a Continental Cyclo King 35mm tyre on a 29' rim and it fits when it's flat but once inflated it does touch the air cap on the shock.

The Frame has has a repair on the lower Downtube, and there is a Crack just between two of the Bottle cage eye lids on the seat tube aswell. The stem can only take the smalled size handbars and not 31.8mm. so titanium would work nice or gravel bars.

The BB is a FSA Shimano BB.

rear is a QR mount same as front.

plan was to make a single speed sub 7kg Gravel bike but, don't have the cash for that Grade crank nor Wheels to build for myself at this time.

The carbon Bars and Carbon seatpost will be included aswell as the seat.

title: ELECTRIC BIKES COMPLETE E-MTB BUILT IN S.A OR CONVERT YOUR MTB TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. title: Electric Bikes | e-MTB | Electric Bicycles | Mid drive ebikes | Hub drive e-bikes | E-bike adventure
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

CityGlide by NextSport is the premier line of cruising BIG WHEEL Scooters. Great for last mile commuting and perfect for just getting out and having fun! title: Electric bicycles mid drive  Cruisers Complete ebikes OR Convert your Bicycle to an electric bike
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. title: Mountain e bike trail ripper

Super charge your existing mountain bike with a 1000 watt, 1500 watt or the insane 2 000 watt e bike motor that will blast you from your comfy couch into the wild outdoors.


Take effortlessly to the many trails nature intended you to travel - inhale the freshest air with wild abandon and delight in the tranquil beauty of natures bounty - just a hop and a skip from the suburban nightmare!


Be finally free to roam the vast trails, all at your speed and your leisure soaking up the sunshine and atmosphere patiently waiting just for you and your e bike.


We can transform your existing bike or build a new bike into an e bike machine that will allow you to take flight and explore.


Do not hesitate, give me a shout on whatsapp 071 811 2907 and lets get you into those cycle shorts!!


Cheers


Michael
